sentences.sentence: He wisher he could speak English as fluently as native Americans.
sentences.translation: 他真盼望能说像当地老美一样流利的英文。

sentences.sentence: The world suffers most from the disinterested tyranny of its well wisher.
sentences.translation: 世界在漠然的苛政中为善者承受极大的痛楚。

sentences.sentence: Let cloud wisher to bless with full intention, embellish your sweet dream. Wishing you a happy New Year!
sentences.translation: 让云捎去满心的祝福，点缀你甜蜜的梦乡。愿你拥有一个幸福快乐的新年！
